verbs.description: social media [V: is] changing the way we think you know the situation well you sit down with some close friends enjoying a good conversation for a few minutes then someone checks their phone you see another friend pick up hers then another friend follows suit and in a moment they are all silent transfixed by the screens in front of them social media facebook social
